mapper.select: select id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, status_id, sort, msg_type, msg_title, msg_text, is_time_send, send_time, is_send, is_top, back_remark from springboot.msg where id = #{id}
select id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, status_id, sort, msg_type, msg_title, msg_text, is_time_send, send_time, is_send, is_top, back_remark from springboot.msg limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into springboot.msg(gmt_create, gmt_modified, status_id, sort, msg_type, msg_title, msg_text, is_time_send, send_time, is_send, is_top, back_remark) values (#{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified}, #{statusId}, #{sort}, #{msgType}, #{msgTitle}, #{msgText}, #{isTimeSend}, #{sendTime}, #{isSend}, #{isTop}, #{backRemark})
mapper.update:
update springboot.msg
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified},
status_id = #{statusId},
sort = #{sort},
msg_type = #{msgType},
msg_title = #{msgTitle},
msg_text = #{msgText},
is_time_send = #{isTimeSend},
send_time = #{sendTime},
is_send = #{isSend},
is_top = #{isTop},
back_remark = #{backRemark},
where id = #{id}
